EmailTemplate.name: TS-2016-06-07-HP Discover.EMAIL-Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=}}, Going to HPE Discover? Come Win a Drone!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}}, Are you going to HPE Discover next week? Well we are. We’ll be at booth #702 and showcasing our latest integration with HPE OneView. With VMTurbo and HPE OneView you'll be able to:
- Guarantee the performance of any application - Accelerate your transition to hybrid-cloud infrastructure - Deliver cloud-like economics on-premises
Think that’s too good to be true? Come by booth #702 and we’ll show you a demo. We’ll also be raffling off a Fitbit, Beats Headphones & a Drone. If you can’t make it but want to learn more schedule a demo today <[[http://vmturbo.com/product/request-a-demo/]]> Hope to see you there. <[[http://www.drakesf.com/]]>- The VMTurbo Team
